thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and friendly staff!
thread.title_full: Great location and friendly staff! - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: satyrahowell
title: Great location and friendly staff!
text: The Casablanca is right off Times Square- close enough for easy walking to plays and great restaurants but away from the noise and crowds of Times Square. Wonderful staff ready to help with directions, dinner reservations or anything you need. Our room was very comfortable and our bathroom was the largest I have ever had in NYC. Having a free breakfast and afternoon snacks/drinks is a real plus.
